This also means that you can download and install any voices you would like to have on your computer, and Talkie should recognize them automatically.

frontend_faq010A.message: Google Chrome (È™i probabil alte browsere bazate pe Chromium) au avut aceastÄƒ problemÄƒ/eroare Ã®ncepÃ¢nd cu cel puÈ›in anul 2014. Talkie are anumite soluÈ›ii È™i o opÈ›iune pentru activarea/dezactivarea citirii textului Ã®n pÄƒrÈ›i mai scurte. Voi continua sÄƒ Ã®mbunÄƒtÄƒÈ›esc soluÈ›ia, dar pÃ¢nÄƒ cÃ¢nd echipa Chromium funcÈ›ioneazÄƒ, s-ar putea sÄƒ nu funcÈ›ioneze 100%. DacÄƒ Ã®ntÃ¢mpinaÈ›i aceastÄƒ problemÄƒ, anunÈ›aÈ›i-ne ce browser È™i versiune, sistemul de operare È™i versiunea È™i limba/vocea pe care o utilizaÈ›i.
frontend_faq010A.original: Google Chrome (and presumably other Chromium based browsers) have had this issue/bug since at least year 2014. Talkie has some workarounds in place, and an option to enable/disable reading text in shorter parts. I will continue to improve the workaround, but until the Chromium team works it might not work 100%. If you experience this issue, please let me know which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using.

frontend_faq010Q.message: De ce Talkie nu mai citiÈ›i dupÄƒ 20-30 de cuvinte sau cÃ¢teva secunde?
frontend_faq010Q.original: Why does Talkie stop reading after 20-30 words or a few seconds?

frontend_faq011A.message: ExistÄƒ douÄƒ motive. Ãn primul rÃ¢nd, dacÄƒ vocea activÄƒ este online, trebuie sÄƒ descÄƒrcaÈ›i fiÈ™ierul de vorbire Ã®nainte de ao juca. Aceasta Ã®nseamnÄƒ o pauzÄƒ adÄƒugatÄƒ care depinde de viteza de conectare la internet. PuteÈ›i verifica care sunt vocile online Ã®n lista de voci. Cel de-al doilea motiv este cÄƒ soluÈ›ia pentru vorbirea textelor lungi ridicÄƒ textul Ã®n pÄƒrÈ›i mai scurte, de obicei pe propoziÈ›ii sau pe clauze. Aceasta poate adÄƒuga o pauzÄƒ suplimentarÄƒ pentru fiecare pauzÄƒ. PuteÈ›i permite citirea textelor lungi ca parte a opÈ›iunilor, care ar trebui sÄƒ elimine pauza pe sistemele acceptate.
frontend_faq011A.original: There are two reasons. Firstly, if the active voice is online it needs to download the speech file before playing it. This means an added pause which is depending on your internet connection speed. You can check which voices are online in the list of voices. The second reason is that the workaround for speaking long texts chops up the text in shorter parts, usually per sentence or per clause. This can add an extra pause for each pause. You can enable reading long texts as one part in the options, which should remove the pause on supported systems.

frontend_faq011Q.original: Why does Talkie sometime have a long pause between sentences and words?

frontend_faq012A.message: Din pacate, nu. Se pare cÄƒ Google Docs (precum È™i Foaia de calcul Google, Google Drive È™i altele similare) nu este un site web, ci o â€aplicaÈ›ie specialÄƒ Ã®n browserâ€ creatÄƒ de Google. Talkie nu poate accesa textul selectat È™i nici nu poate adÄƒuga elemente din meniul contextual. Voi investiga Ã®n continuare dacÄƒ existÄƒ o modalitate de a adÄƒuga asistenÈ›Äƒ Google Docs la Talkie .
frontend_faq012A.original: Unfortunately, no. It turns out that Google Docs (as well as Google Spreadsheet, Google Drive, and similar) is not a website, but a special "application in the browser" created by Google. Talkie cannot access the selected text, nor add context menu items. I will investigate further if there is some way to add Google Docs support to Talkie.

frontend_faq019A.message: Cu siguranÈ›Äƒ! Ar fi minunat sÄƒ obÈ›ineÈ›i ajutor Ã®n traducerea Talkie , sÄƒ testaÈ›i Talkie pe noile sisteme, sÄƒ investiga erorile È™i sÄƒ adÄƒugaÈ›i noi caracteristici. ConsultaÈ›i pagina proiectului pentru instrucÈ›iuni.

frontend_faq020A.message: Da â€” spuneÈ›i prietenilor dvs. despre Talkie! Poate trimiteÈ›i un link cÄƒtre celebritatea preferatÄƒ de internet, grupul online sau buletinul informativ. RÄƒspÃ¢ndirea cuvÃ¢ntului despre Talkie este foarte apreciatÄƒ!
frontend_faq020A.original: Yes â€” please tell your friends about Talkie! Perhaps send a link to your favorite internet celebrity, online group, or newsletter. You can even ask your boss to install it on all the computers at work, or your teacher to install it at school. Spreading the word about Talkie is very much appreciated!

frontend_faq020Q.message: Pot ajuta Talkie Ã®n orice alt mod?

frontend_faq021A.message: Este nevoie de mult timp È™i efort pentru a dezvolta È™i Ã®ntreÈ›ine Talkie â€” sute de ore pÃ¢nÄƒ acum. Cu toate acestea, Talkie este gratuit pentru toatÄƒ lumea sÄƒ foloseascÄƒ cÃ¢t de mult doreÈ™te. Pentru a sprijini financiar atÃ¢t dezvoltarea, Ã®ntreÈ›inerea, cÃ¢t È™i menÈ›inerea gratuitÄƒ a Talkie gratuit, unele funcÈ›ii sunt disponibile numai utilizatorilor Talkie Premium .
frontend_faq021A.original: It takes quite a lot of time and effort to develop and maintain Talkie â€” hundreds of hours so far. Yet, Talkie is free for everyone to use as much as they like. To financially support further both development, maintenance and keeping the free Talkie free, some features are only available to Talkie Premium users.

frontend_faq021Q.message: De ce existÄƒ douÄƒ ediÈ›ii ale Talkie ?
frontend_faq021Q.original: Why are there two editions of Talkie?

frontend_faq022A.message: Da, existÄƒ mai multe opÈ›iuni de platÄƒ disponibile.
frontend_faq022A.original: Yes, there are multiple payment options available.

frontend_faq022Q.message: Pot plÄƒti folosind PayPal, transfer bancar etc.?
frontend_faq022Q.original: Can I pay using PayPal, bank transfer, etcetera?

frontend_faq023A.message: Da, dacÄƒ aÈ›i plÄƒtit utilizÃ¢nd PayPal sau Stripe, care oferÄƒ o gestionare simplÄƒ a rambursÄƒrilor. RambursÄƒrile nu sunt, Ã®n general, disponibile pentru alte metode de platÄƒ datoritÄƒ volumului de muncÄƒ suplimentarÄƒ pe care Ã®l necesitÄƒ, plus riscul ca banii sÄƒ fie rambursaÈ›i Ã®ntr-un cont greÈ™it.
frontend_faq023A.original: Yes, if you paid using PayPal or Stripe, which offer simple refund management. Refunds are generally not available for other methods of payments due to the amount of extra work it requires, plus the risk that the money gets refunded to the wrong account.

frontend_faq024A.message: Sigur! Doar activaÈ›i actualizarea Talkie Premium pentru a o Ã®ncerca.
frontend_faq024A.original: Sure! Just enable the Talkie Premium upgrade to try it out.

frontend_faq024Q.original: Can I try out Talkie Premium for free?

frontend_faq025A.message: Ãn Talkie nu existÄƒ reclamÄƒ, colectare de date sau urmÄƒrire a utilizatorilor. Utilizatorii fericiÈ›i care plÄƒtesc pentru Talkie Premium sunt singura generare de bani.
frontend_faq025A.original: There is no advertisement, data collection, or user tracking in Talkie. Happy users paying for Talkie Premium is the only monetization.

frontend_faq025Q.message: Extensiile Talkie conÈ›in reclame, colecteazÄƒ date sau urmÄƒresc utilizatorii?
frontend_faq025Q.original: Does the Talkie extensions contain advertisement, collect data, or track users?

frontend_faq026A.message: Sistemul de onoare este atunci cÃ¢nd se crede cÄƒ persoanele sunt oneste È™i respectÄƒ orientÄƒrile fÄƒrÄƒ controale strict aplicate. Pentru Talkie Premium Ã®ncredere cÄƒ cei care fac upgrade au plÄƒtit pentru asta.
frontend_faq026A.original: The honor system is when individuals are trusted to be honest, and adhere to guidelines without strictly enforced checks. For Talkie Premium trusting that those who upgrade have paid for it.

frontend_faq027A.message: Deoarece oamenii din Ã®ntreaga lume folosesc monede diferite, au niveluri diferite de venit disponibil È™i au niveluri diferite de apreciere pentru caracteristicile lui Talkie Premium. Nu existÄƒ un preÈ› unic, care sÄƒ funcÈ›ioneze bine pentru toatÄƒ lumea din lume. Pe lÃ¢ngÄƒ aceasta, apar È™i fluctuaÈ›iile monedelor, tendinÈ›ele ciclului economic, variaÈ›iile regionale/intra-È›Äƒri etc. Una peste alta, preÈ›urile setÄƒrilor pentru un produs vÃ¢ndut Ã®n Ã®ntreaga lume sunt complicate. Este mai uÈ™or sÄƒ permiteÈ›i tuturor sÄƒ Ã®È™i stabileascÄƒ propriul preÈ› È™i sÄƒ vÄƒ asiguraÈ›i cÄƒ produsul este suficient de bun pentru a garanta o platÄƒ.
frontend_faq027A.original: Because people around the world use different currencies, have different levels of disposable income, and have different levels of appreciation for Talkie Premium's features. There is no single, fixed price that works well for everyone in the world. On top of that comes fluctuations in currencies, economic cycle trends, regional/intra-country variations, etcetera. All in all, settings prices for a product sold worldwide is complicated. It is easier to let everyone set their own price, and ensure that the product is good enough to warrant a payment.

frontend_faq027Q.message: De ce Ã®mi pot stabili propriul preÈ›?
frontend_faq027Q.original: Why can I set my own price?

frontend_faq028A.message: Din moment ce nu È™tiu cÃ¢È›i bani sunteÈ›i capabili sÄƒ cheltuiÈ›i pentru software text-to-speech, prefer sÄƒ plÄƒtiÈ›i ceea ce credeÈ›i cÄƒ Talkie Premium meritÄƒ pentru dvs. â€” nici mai mult, nici mai puÈ›in. Ãn cazul Ã®n care cÄƒutaÈ›i un cadru de referinÈ›Äƒ, atunci cÃ¢nd Google a gestionat plÄƒÈ›i pentru Talkie Premium , abonamentul a costat 25 $ $ (dolar SUA) pe an Ã®n Statele Unite ale Americii. ReÈ›ineÈ›i cÄƒ Google a ajustat preÈ›urile pentru È›Äƒri È™i monede din Ã®ntreaga lume pentru a se potrivi condiÈ›iilor locale, deci ar putea fi mai mult sau mai puÈ›in. Ãn acelaÈ™i timp, oricine a cerut politicos ar putea primi gratuit Talkie Premium .
frontend_faq028A.original: Since I don't know how much money you are able to spend on text-to-speech software, I prefer that you pay what you think Talkie Premium is worth to you  â€” no more, no less. In case you are looking for a frame of reference, when Google handled payments for Talkie Premium the subscription cost $$25 (US Dollar) per year in the United States of America. Note that Google adjusted prices around for countries and currencies the world to match local conditions, so it could be more or less. At the same time, anyone who asked politely could also receive Talkie Premium for free.

frontend_faq028Q.original: How much do you recommend I pay?

frontend_faq029A.message: Deoarece implementarea unui sistem de plÄƒÈ›i È™i verificare necesitÄƒ mult timp È™i efort È™i se presupune cÄƒ costul implementÄƒrii verificÄƒrii stricte a plÄƒÈ›ilor este mai mare decÃ¢t pierderile cauzate de persoanele care Ã®nÈ™ealÄƒ sistemul. Verificarea plÄƒÈ›ilor necesitÄƒ, de asemenea, un anumit nivel de colectare a datelor de la sistemele utilizatorilor, iar utilizatorii calificaÈ›i din punct de vedere tehnic pot lucra adesea Ã®n jurul verificÄƒrii oricum. Deci, din punct de vedere tehnic È™i de afaceri, chiar dacÄƒ nu existÄƒ garanÈ›ii, este mai uÈ™or sÄƒ aveÈ›i Ã®ncredere cÄƒ utilizatorii aderÄƒ la sistemul de onoare.
frontend_faq029A.original: Because implementing a system for payments and verification takes a lot of time and effort, and it is assumed that the cost of implementing strict payment verification is higher than the losses from individuals cheating the system. Payment verification also requires some level of data collection from users' systems, and technically skilled users can often work around the verification anyways. So from a technical and business perspective, even though there are no guarantees, it is easier to simply trust that users adhere to the honor system.

frontend_faq029Q.message: De ce nu existÄƒ nicio verificare a plÄƒÈ›ii?
frontend_faq029Q.original: Why is there no payment verification?

frontend_faq030A.message: Decizia de a nu implementa verificarea plÄƒÈ›ii Ã®nseamnÄƒ cÄƒ suma plÄƒtitÄƒ nu poate fi verificatÄƒ. Ãn plus, costul â€fabricÄƒriiâ€ unei copii digitale a Talkie Premium este zero, deci acordarea acesteia pentru nimic nu implicÄƒ o pierdere financiarÄƒ pentru dezvoltator. ExistÄƒ, de asemenea, speranÈ›a cÄƒ, dacÄƒ Ã®È›i place Talkie Premium , vei spune prietenilor tÄƒi despre asta. RenunÈ›area la Talkie Premium poate fi vÄƒzutÄƒ È™i ca un efort de marketing.
frontend_faq030A.original: The decision to not implement payment verification means that the amount paid cannot be verified. In addition, the cost of "manufacturing" a digital copy of Talkie Premium is zero, so giving it away for nothing does not imply a financial loss for the developer. There is also the hope that if you like Talkie Premium, you will tell your friends about it. Giving away Talkie Premium can also be seen as a marketing effort.

frontend_faq030Q.message: De ce pot alege sÄƒ nu plÄƒtesc nimic?
frontend_faq030Q.original: Why can I choose to pay nothing?

frontend_faq031A.message: Da, folosind Stripe. ConsultaÈ›i opÈ›iuni de platÄƒ suplimentare.
frontend_faq031A.original: Yes, by using Stripe. See additional payment options.

frontend_faq031Q.message: Pot efectua o platÄƒ lunarÄƒ sau anualÄƒ recurentÄƒ?
frontend_faq031Q.original: Can I make a recurring monthly or yearly payment?

frontend_faq032A.message: Da, dacÄƒ o solicitaÈ›i prin e-mail. VÄƒ rugÄƒm sÄƒ includeÈ›i numele, adresa È™i, opÈ›ional, identificatorul dvs. de taxÄƒ pe valoarea adÄƒugatÄƒ (TVA) (sau echivalent).
frontend_faq032A.original: Yes, if you request it via email. Please include your name, address, and optionally your value-added tax (VAT) identifier (or equivalent).

frontend_faq032Q.message: Pot primi o chitanÈ›Äƒ pentru plata mea?
frontend_faq032Q.original: Can I get a receipt for my payment?

frontend_faq033A.message: Pentru cÄƒ Ã®È›i plac funcÈ›iile suplimentare pe care Talkie Premium oferÄƒ È™i sentimentul fericit de a contribui la dezvoltarea de software open source de cÄƒtre dezvoltatori independenÈ›i. frontend_faq033A.original: Because you like the additional features Talkie Premium provides, and the happy feeling of contributing to open source software development by independent developers. Due to relatively high personell cost of development and maintenance, but zero cost of "manufacturing" digital copies, payments for Talkie Premium can also be seen as providing support for future development and maintenance, as opposed to the value of the product at the time of payment.

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie fost dezvoltat cu cÃ¢teva zile Ã®nainte de Anul Nou 2016/2017, la provocarea unui prieten. Provocarea a Ã®nceput cu Ã®ntrebarea: Ã®n timp ce faceÈ›i naveta la serviciu, este posibil sÄƒ ascultaÈ›i un articol Ã®n loc sÄƒ Ã®l citiÈ›i? UÈ™or, am spus, È™i mi-am propus sÄƒ dovedesc acest lucru â€” sau cel puÈ›in sÄƒ-mi fac browserul sÄƒ rosteascÄƒ text folosind o voce prosteascÄƒ de computer. EdiÈ›ia de bazÄƒ, fÄƒrÄƒ nicio interfaÈ›Äƒ cu utilizatorul, s-a dovedit a fi banalÄƒ de creat. AdÄƒugarea unei interfeÈ›e cu utilizatorul a durat puÈ›in mai mult. AdÄƒugÃ¢nd detecÈ›ia corectÄƒ a limbii, mai multe coduri. DepÄƒÈ™irea erorilor din browser funcÈ›ioneazÄƒ È™i mai mult. Lista de Ã®mbunÄƒtÄƒÈ›iri È™i caracteristici continuÄƒ â€” È™i cÃ¢teva mii de linii de cod mai tÃ¢rziu, vÄƒ uitaÈ›i la rezultatul final.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it â€” or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic edition, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on â€” and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

If that does not give you an answer, please send me any questions you might have. I would be happy if your experience using $NAME$ is smooth and enjoyable!

frontend_upgradeExplanation02.original: After sending the payment there are no upgrade codes to enter, no user accounts to register, or any other payment verification in place. Instead Talkie Premium uses the honor system.
